DVSNullHandleException Class Reference

Public Methods

 DVSNullHandleException (const char *context, std::exception *e) throw ()
 DVSNullHandleException (const DVSNullHandleException &e) throw ()

Detailed Description

DVSHandle object used has become invalid This exception is thrown when a DVSHandle object is used to obtain a handle when the DVSCard object from which this has been obtained has been deleted.

If this exception occurs there is a bug in your code - since you should never try to use a handle once the card handle has been effectively closed (by destroying its DVSCard object)

Parameters:
context   Information on the context in which this exception is occurring - eg. the function call that caused it. NULL if no context string is required
e   The causal parent exception of this one being instantiated. See DVSException::DVSException()
See also:
DVSCard , DVSException
